operator.name: Octave Script Operator
operator.synopsis: Allows to execute an octave script.
operator.help:
You can write any octave code in the operator script. The input exampleSets are translated either into a structure or into a cell, according to the parameter. Output exampleSets are translated back with the same format. In order to be able to call m-files, you might want to either use addpath() + any function name (recommended). Or alternatively use source().
Zhang, Y., and Marié, S., (2012).
